[Generic]

Prerequisites Tier 1 with the Vigilant Seal

Cost 4 Fame

Effect It doesn't matter how powerful your weapons are if you don't know where to strike. Before an adventure, you take time to study a certain category of creatures, making it easier to recall their capabilities later. When you purchase this boon, either select one creature type from List 1 below, or choose two creature types from List 2. While this boon is slotted, you have a +1 circumstance bonus to Recall Knowledge about creatures of the selected type(s). If your Reputation Tier for the Vigilant Seal faction is 4, this bonus increases to +2.

List 1

  • @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Recall Knowledge (Occultism)]{Aberration};
  • @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Recall Knowledge (Nature)]{Animal};
  • @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Recall Knowledge (Nature)]{Beast (nature)} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Recall Knowledge (Arcana)]{Beast (arcana)};
  • @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Recall Knowledge (Arcana)]{Construct (arcana)} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Recall Knowledge (Crafting)]{Construct (crafting)};
  • @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Recall Knowledge (Arcana)]{Dragon};
  • @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Recall Knowledge (Arcana)]{Elemental (arcana)} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Recall Knowledge (Nature)]{Elemental (nature)};
  • @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Recall Knowledge (Religion)]{Fiend} or
  • @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Recall Knowledge (Religion)]{Undead}.

List 2

  • @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Recall Knowledge (Occultism)]{Astral};
  • @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Recall Knowledge (Religion)]{Celestial};
  • @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Recall Knowledge (Occultism)]{Ethereal};
  • @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Recall Knowledge (Nature)]{Fey};
  • @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Recall Knowledge (Nature)]{Fungus};
  • @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Recall Knowledge (Society)]{Giant};
  • @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Recall Knowledge (Religion)]{Monitor};
  • @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Recall Knowledge (Occultism)]{Ooze} or
  • @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Recall Knowledge (Nature)]{Plant}.
